alert.note: Alert for Brown; Calumet; Door; Kewaunee; Manitowoc (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 24 at 5:38AM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT BROWN...KEWAUNEE...SOUTHERN DOOR...NORTHEASTERN CALUMET AND NORTHERN MANITOWOC COUNTIES THROUGH 615 AM CDT... At 537 AM CDT, trained weather spotters reported strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Green Bay to near Brillion. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Green Bay, Sturgeon Bay, Kewaunee, Bay Shore Park, Algoma, Brillion, Luxemburg, Denmark, Two Creeks, and Bellevue Town. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
